get.description: This API lists a particular number of comments recorded on an article translation, based on the limit specified.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Index number starting from which the comments must be fetched

schema.description: Index number starting from which the comments must be fetched

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort comments by the @commentedTime@ attribute. The default sorting order is ascending. @-commentedTime@ denotes descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Sort comments by the @commentedTime@ attribute. The default sorting order is ascending. @-commentedTime@ denotes descending order of sorting.

post.description: This API adds a comment to an article translation.

post.summary: Move article translations comments to recycle bin
post.description: This API move the article comments to recyclebin.

get.description: To fetch list of kb comments that has been moderated earlier

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorts the listing comments based on the commentedTime. @commentedTime@ Ascending Order (default). @-commentedTime@ Descending Order

schema.description: Sorts the listing comments based on the commentedTime. @commentedTime@ Ascending Order (default). @-commentedTime@ Descending Order

get.description: To Fetch moderated articles comment count

post.summary: Convert Article Translation comment as Ticket
post.description: This API converts the comment content to ticket to respective department configured for the Root category

get.description: This API fetches an article translation comment from the portal.

delete.description: This API deletes an existing article translation comment.

patch.description: This API updates an existing article translation comment.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Content of the comment. To retrieve or set user mentions, use this code format:      AGENT : _zsu[@user:{zuid}]zsu_, Enduser : _zsu[@enduser:{zuid}]zsu_, Group : _zsu[@group:{groupid}]zsu_, HashTag : _zsh[#{HEADER_DATA}]zsh_.
Visibility of the comment, which can be set only at the time of commenting.
Used to denote the content-type which maybe @html@ or @plainText@. The default type is @html@.
Visibility of the comment, which can be set only at the time of commenting.

Visibility of the comment, which can be set only at the time of commenting.
Used to denote the content-type which maybe @html@ or @plainText@. The default type is @html@.

locale_query.name: locale
locale_query.description: Fetches the moderated comments based on the specified language.

schema.description: Fetches the moderated comments based on the specified language.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limits the maximum number of comments to fetch.

schema.description: Limits the maximum number of comments to fetch.

from.name: from
from.description: Index number starting from which the moderated comments must be fetched

schema.description: Index number starting from which the moderated comments must be fetched

commentedBy.name: commentedBy
commentedBy.description: Fetches only the comments made by the specified user (ID).

schema.description: Fetches only the comments made by the specified user (ID).

categoryId.name: categoryId
categoryId.description: Fetches only the comments made by the specified category (ID).

schema.description: Fetches only the comments made by the specified category (ID).

isPublic.description: Visibility of the comment, which can be set only at the time of commenting.

contentType.description: Used to denote the content-type which maybe @html@ or @plainText@. The default type is @html@.
